description: Same lint failure pattern across 3 consecutive sprints
sprintResults:
## Sprint 9 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | QG Failure |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #80 | Add config loader | 2 | ✅ Done | #81 | 1 retry — unused import |
| #82 | Add env parser | 2 | ✅ Done | #83 | 1 retry — unused import |
| #84 | Add secret manager | 3 | ✅ Done | #85 | 2 retries — unused imports |
| #86 | Add feature flags | 2 | ✅ Done | #87 | 1 retry — unused import |
| #88 | Add config watcher | 2 | ✅ Done | #89 | Pass first try |
| #90 | Update defaults | 1 | ✅ Done | #91 | Pass first try |

**Velocity**: 12/12 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 45m (estimated 1h 15m)
**Recurring Pattern**: Unused import lint failures
- Sprint 7: 3/6 issues had unused import failures
- Sprint 8: 4/6 issues had unused import failures
- Sprint 9: 4/6 issues had unused import failures
**Total Retries from Pattern**: 16 across 3 sprints
**Root Cause**: Agent adds speculative imports that aren't used
previousImprovements:
Sprint 7 retro: 'Fix lint issues' (too vague, didn't address root cause)
Sprint 8 retro: 'Run linter before commit' (added but agent still generates unused imports)

description: Carryover items appearing every sprint for 4 sprints
sprintResults:
## Sprint 12 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | Carryover From |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|
| #95 | Add GraphQL schema | 5 | ❌ Failed | Sprint 9 (3rd carry) |
| #110 | Add resolver layer | 3 | ❌ Failed | Sprint 10 (2nd carry) |
| #115 | Add subscription support | 3 | ✅ Done | Sprint 11 (1st carry) |
| #120 | Fix query optimizer | 2 | ✅ Done | New |
| #122 | Add mutation tests | 2 | ✅ Done | New |
| #124 | Update schema docs | 1 | ✅ Done | New |

**Velocity**: 8/16 points completed
**Duration**: 2h 00m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Carryover Pattern**:
- Issue #95: Failed in Sprint 9, 10, 11, 12 (4 consecutive failures)
- Issue #110: Failed in Sprint 10, 11, 12 (3 consecutive failures)
- Issue #115: Failed in Sprint 11, completed in Sprint 12
**Root Cause #95**: Issue is too complex for single-session execution (5 points)
**Root Cause #110**: Depends on #95 which keeps failing
**Planning Issue**: Same failing issues re-planned without investigation
previousImprovements: Sprint 9-11: All noted carryover but didn't address root cause

description: Same agent (code-worker) failing on all complex architectural issues
sprintResults:
## Sprint 18 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | Agent | Complexity |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #170 | Implement CQRS pattern | 5 | ❌ Failed | code-worker | High |
| #172 | Add event sourcing | 5 | ❌ Failed | code-worker | High |
| #174 | Fix simple bug | 1 | ✅ Done | code-worker | Low |
| #176 | Add unit test | 1 | ✅ Done | code-worker | Low |
| #178 | Update config | 1 | ✅ Done | code-worker | Low |
| #180 | Fix typo | 1 | ✅ Done | code-worker | Low |

**Velocity**: 4/14 points completed
**Duration**: 2h 15m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Agent Performance Pattern** (last 5 sprints):
- code-worker on high-complexity (>3 pts): 2/12 success (17%)
- code-worker on low-complexity (≤3 pts): 28/30 success (93%)
**Root Cause**: code-worker agent lacks architectural pattern knowledge
**Previous Failures**: CQRS, event sourcing, saga pattern, domain events all failed
**Agent Prompt**: Missing guidance for complex architectural patterns
previousImprovements: Sprint 14-17: Various config tweaks, none addressed agent capability gap

- Sprint 18: 0/6 rejected (0%)
- Sprint 19: 0/6 rejected (0%)
- Sprint 20: 1/6 rejected (17%) — prompt updated
- Sprint 21: 3/6 rejected (50%)
- Sprint 22: 4/6 rejected (67%)

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Timeout? |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #160 | Refactor auth module | 5 | ❌ Failed | — | Yes — 90m limit |
| #162 | Fix small bug | 1 | ✅ Done | #163 | No |
| #164 | Add unit test | 1 | ✅ Done | #165 | No |
| #166 | Update config | 1 | ✅ Done | #167 | No |
| #168 | Fix import path | 1 | ✅ Done | #169 | No |
| #170 | Add docs | 1 | ✅ Done | #171 | No |

**Velocity**: 5/10 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 30m (session timeout)
**Session Timeout Pattern** (all refactor issues):
- Sprint 11: 'Refactor DB layer' (5pts) — timed out
- Sprint 13: 'Refactor API routes' (5pts) — timed out
- Sprint 15: 'Refactor middleware' (5pts) — timed out
- Sprint 17: 'Refactor auth module' (5pts) — timed out
**Pattern**: Every 5-point refactor issue times out at 90m
**Root Cause**: Large refactors need >90m but session limit is 90m
**Previous Retros**: Each noted timeout but didn't change config or splitting strategy
previousImprovements:
Sprint 11 retro: 'Session timed out — consider longer sessions'
Sprint 13 retro: 'Timeout again — investigate'
Sprint 15 retro: 'Refactor timed out — known issue'
